originalText.text: Sooo long story short, I’ve very picky about sunglasses, and I strolled into Illesteva with a friend just to browse for glasses and Camille (or Camilla) picked out glasses for me that she said would fit my vibe and I absolutely fell in love with this pair. I have a large head so it’s usually difficult, but she said that she could adjust the size on the spot! She was so caring and knowledgeable, and made the whole experience easy for me. I highly recommend her to anyone and everyone!

I highly recommend her to anyone and everyone!

originalText.text: Excellent service!! They helped me replace the lenses in my old pair of Illesteva shades. So friendly and helpful. Thank you !

text.text: Excellent service!! They helped me replace the lenses in my old pair of Illesteva shades. So friendly and helpful. Thank you !

originalText.text: The staff has a wonderful attitude when you’re about to purchase, but when you come back with any questions or issues, they become highly defensive. I also think that if you truly believe in your brand and the materials you use, your return policy for a pair of 250 dollar glasses would not be 10 days and would not depend on whether the price sticker is still attached to the glasses or not. That’s just a bit absurd and makes me question the actual quality of these glasses. Anything of that price should have at least 30 days.

originalText.text:
Ikera T. deserves a raise!!!
I've been an illesteva customer since 2019 - originally bought an optical pair (Mayfair) and sunglasses (Portofino) at the Venice, CA location.
Was looking to upgrade both pairs this year and visited the Prince Street location in SoHo NYC. I was not surprised to learn that the level of customer service at this location matched the level of care at the Venice location.
Marg, the Optician, was very helpful in explaining the process for my optical frame fitting (measuring my Pupillary Distance(PD) and Ocular Center(OC)).
Kera, the sales associate, was extremely patient with me as I spent almost 1hr+ trying on both optical lenses and sunglasses. I commend her for her honesty as I tried countless pairs of glasses and she kept it real with me if a pair didn’t fit my face.
I highly recommend going to any illesteva location but if you go to the SoHo one, go see Marg and Ikera!
Thanks - Ruben

originalText.text: Zero stars. I purchased a pair of sunglasses online which turned out to be defective. They failed well within the warranty period through no fault of my own, they were clearly defective but this company refused to accept any responsibility and instead tried to sell me another pair! I tried through multiple channels to contact them but have been repeatedly ignored. I tried to call NYC Soho store - call cant' be connected, I visited store in person to be told gruffly only online support can help. Online customer service does not respond, there is now way to speak to anyone just an email address that is unattended. Terrible product and terrible customer service.
